HelpTooltip:
Extracts and Outputs the position from a Game Object.

GameObject Data In port connects to a GameObject
node Data Out port. Live Data Out port connects to a
DataType, Velocity, Record Examples and Machine
Learning System nodes.

Use local space is only applicable if the GameObject is a
child of another object.
PortTooltip: Connect to Data In port. Outputs a Vector3

tips: x position value: turn on/off using the toggle, flashes when detecting input
y position value: turn on/off using the toggle, flashes when detecting input
z position value: turn on/off using the toggle, flashes when detecting input
check the box to use local space values
